description: Current and avg. KPI-s. Expects 'get_load_average' and 'backends'  helpers to be installed on the monitored DB.

panels.description: PRIMARY - accepting writes, REPLICA - read-only

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  (data->'in_recovery_int')::int
FROM
  wal
WHERE
  time > now() - '$online_interval'::interval
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: Instance state

panels.description: Time from last Postgres process restart.  < 5m Error, < 30m Warn thresholds by default

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  (data->'postmaster_uptime_s')::int
FROM
  wal
WHERE
  time > now() - '$online_interval'::interval
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: Instance uptime

panels.description:
"SHOW server_version_num;"
110005 => 11.5

targets.rawSql: select time, (data->'server_version_num')::int8 as value from settings where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time) order by time desc limit 1;

panels.title: PG version num.

panels.description: Longest query duration during last $online_interval

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  0 AS time,
  max((data->'longest_query_seconds')::int)
FROM
  backends
WHERE
  time > now() - '$online_interval'::interval
  AND dbname = '$dbname'

panels.title: Longest query runtime

panels.description: Connected sessions, including Postgres internal processes like Autovacuum. < 1 Warn / > 300 Error thresholds by default

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  (data->'numbackends')::int
FROM
  db_stats
WHERE
  time > now() - '$online_interval'::interval
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: Active connections

panels.description: "max_connections" configuration setting. Changing requires re-start. 500/1000 Warn / Error thresholds by default

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  (data->'max_connections')::int
FROM
  settings
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: Max. connections

panels.description: Max number of queries waiting on resources locked by other sessions.  1 Warn / 5 Err thresholds by default

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  0 as time,
  max((data->'waiting')::int)
FROM
  backends
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time, $online_interval)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'

panels.title: Blocked sessions

panels.description: Shared Buffers is the Postgres -managed file cache and 90%+ is what you normally want to see for best performance.

targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  ((hit-hit_lag)::numeric / ((hit-hit_lag) + (read-read_lag)))*100 as "Shared buffers hit ratio"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'blks_hit')::int8 as hit, lag((data->>'blks_hit')::int8) over w as hit_lag,
          (data->>'blks_read')::int8 as read, lag((data->>'blks_read')::int8) over w as read_lag,
          (data->>'xact_rollback')::int8 as roll, lag((data->>'xact_rollback')::int8) over w as roll_lag,
          (data->>'xact_commit')::int8 as comm, lag((data->>'xact_commit')::int8) over w as comm_lag,
          time
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where hit > hit_lag or read > read_lag
order by 1

panels.title: Shared Buffers hit pct.

panels.description: 0.5% Warn / 1% Error thresholds by default

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $online_interval),
  max((roll-roll_lag)::numeric / ((roll-roll_lag) + (comm-comm_lag)))*100 as "TX rollback ratio"
from (
  select
      time,
      (data->>'xact_rollback')::int8 as roll, lag((data->>'xact_rollback')::int8) over w as roll_lag,
      (data->>'xact_commit')::int8 as comm, lag((data->>'xact_commit')::int8) over w as comm_lag
  FROM
      db_stats
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(time)
    AND dbname = '$dbname'
    window w as (order by time)
) x
WHERE comm > comm_lag or roll > roll_lag
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: TX rollback pct. (avg.)

panels.description: Transactions per Second. Last $online_interval average. <0.1 % Error / < 1.0 Warn thresholds by default

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $online_interval),
  avg( ((roll-roll_lag) + (comm-comm_lag)) / extract(epoch from (time - time_lag))  )
from (
  select
      time, lag(time) over w as time_lag,
      (data->>'xact_rollback')::int8 as roll, lag((data->>'xact_rollback')::int8) over w as roll_lag,
      (data->>'xact_commit')::int8 as comm, lag((data->>'xact_commit')::int8) over w as comm_lag
  FROM
      db_stats
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(time)
    AND dbname = '$dbname'
    window w as (order by time)
) x
WHERE (comm > comm_lag or roll > roll_lag) and time > time_lag
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: TPS (avg.)

panels.description: Queries per Second based on  "pg_stat_statements" extension info. Last $online_interval avg. < 0.1 Error / < 1 Warning thresholds by default

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $online_interval),
  avg( (c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as qps
from (
        select 
          (data->>'calls')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'calls')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from stat_statements_calls
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1 desc
limit 1

panels.title: QPS (avg.)

panels.description: Transactions opened but where no queries are being executed.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  0 as time,
  max((data->'idleintransaction')::int)
FROM
  backends
WHERE
  time > now() - '$online_interval'::interval
  AND dbname = '$dbname'

panels.title: "Idle in TX" count

panels.description: Size for selected DB only

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  (data->'size_b')::int8
FROM
  db_size
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: DB size (last)

targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  last_value-first_value as size_diff
from (
  select
    time,
    first_value((data->>'size_b')::int8) over w,
    last_value((data->>'size_b')::int8) over w
  from
    db_size
  where 
    dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
  window w as (
     order by time rows BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING
  )
) x
order by 1 desc
limit 1

panels.description: Assumes get_psutil_disk wrapper being installed. 10/50GB Warn/Error thresholds by default

targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  (data->'free')::int8
from
  psutil_disk
where 
  dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
  and tag_data->>'dir_or_tablespace' = 'data_directory'
order by 1 desc
limit 1

panels.title: DATADIR disk space left

panels.description: Last $online_interval avg. based on "pg_stat_statements" info.  > 0.5s Warning / > 5s  Error thresholds by default

targets.rawSql:
select
$__timeGroup(time, $online_interval),
avg(case when c = c_lag then 0 else (tt-tt_lag)::numeric / (c-c_lag) end) as "avg_query_runtime"
from (

        select 
          (data->>'total_time')::float8 as tt, lag((data->>'total_time')::float8) over w as tt_lag,
          (data->>'calls')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'calls')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time
        from stat_statements_calls
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where c >= c_lag and tt >= tt_lag
group by 1
order by 1 desc
limit 1

panels.title: Query runtime (avg.)

panels.description: Server configuration changes.  >1 Warn thresholds by default

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  0 as time,
  count(*)
FROM
  configuration_changes
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'

panels.title: Config change events

panels.description: Number of DDL changes i.e. new or changed tables, columns, functions etc.  >1 Warn thresholds by default

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  0 as time,
  count(*)
FROM
  table_changes
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'

panels.title: Table changes

panels.description: Based on pg_stat_archiver. N/A when archiving is not enabled.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  (data->'is_failing_int')::int
FROM
  archiver
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: WAL archiving status

panels.description: Transaction Log Folder size.  Assumes get_wal_size helper being installed. 1/10 GB Warn / 50  Error  thresholds by default

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  (data->'wal_size_b')::float8
FROM
  wal_size
WHERE
  time > now() - '$online_interval'::interval
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: WAL folder size

panels.description: Invalid indexes should be dropped as they're updated on DML operations but cannot be used for speeding up queries. In case multiple indexes of same structure Postgres will use the smallest so the others can be dropped. 'N/A' displayed both when no duplicate indexes or no metrics data for index_stats.

targets.rawSql:
WITH q_duplicates AS (
SELECT
  coalesce(sum(count-1), 0) as extra
FROM (
SELECT
  tag_data->>'table_full_name' as table_full_name,
  data->>'index_def' as index_def,
  count(*)
FROM
  index_stats
WHERE
  time = (select max(time) from index_stats where $__timeFilter(time) AND dbname = '$dbname')
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
GROUP BY 1, 2
HAVING count(*) > 1
) x
)
SELECT
  0 as time,
  sum((data->'is_invalid_int')::int) + (select extra from q_duplicates)
FROM
  index_stats
WHERE
  time = (select max(time) from index_stats where $__timeFilter(time) AND dbname = '$dbname')
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
GROUP BY 1

panels.title: Invalid / duplicate indexes

panels.description: i.e. AUTOVACUUM disabled globally or per table.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  0 as time,
  sum(count)
FROM (

SELECT * FROM (

SELECT
  case when data->>'autovacuum' = 'off' then 1 else 0 end as count
FROM
  settings
WHERE
  dbname = '$dbname'
  AND time > now() - '1d'::interval
ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

) a

UNION ALL

SELECT * FROM (

SELECT
  count(*)
FROM
  table_stats
WHERE
  dbname = '$dbname'
  AND time = (select max(time) from table_stats where dbname = '$dbname')
  AND (data->'no_autovacuum')::int = 1

) b

) x;

panels.title: Autovacuum issues

panels.description: Checkpoints should normally be performed by the background "Checkpointer" process. If seeing high numbers then adjusting server configuration is recommended.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  0 as time,
  coalesce(sum(req - req_lag), 0)
FROM (
SELECT
  (data->'checkpoints_req')::int as req,
  lag((data->'checkpoints_req')::int) over(order by time) as req_lag
FROM
  bgwriter
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
) x
WHERE req > req_lag

panels.title: Checkpoints requested

panels.description: Estimated extra space held by tables (excluding indexes) that would disappear after "compacting".

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  (data->'approx_table_bloat_b')::int8
FROM
  table_bloat_approx_summary_sql
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: Approx. table bloat

panels.description: Transaction logs generation velocity.

targets.rawSql:
select
  0 as time,
  avg((wal-wal_lag) / (etime-lag_etime)) as "WAL rate"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'xlog_location_b')::int8 as wal, lag((data->>'xlog_location_b')::int8) over w as wal_lag,
          extract(epoch from time) as etime,
          lag(extract(epoch from time)) over w as lag_etime,
          time
        from wal
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where wal >= wal_lag and etime > lag_etime

panels.title: WAL per second (avg.)

panels.description: Postgres writes temporary files to disk when sorting / grouping  big amounts of data that doesn't fit into "work_mem".  10/100 MB Warn / Error by default

targets.rawSql:
select
  0 as time,
  avg(case when tb-tb_lag > 0 then (tb-tb_lag) / (etime - lag_etime) else 0 end) as "Temp bytes (1h rate)"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'temp_bytes')::int8 as tb, lag((data->>'temp_bytes')::int8) over w as tb_lag,
          (extract(epoch from time))::int8 as etime,
          (lag(extract(epoch from time)) over w)::int8 as lag_etime
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where tb >= tb_lag and etime > lag_etime

panels.title: Temp. bytes per second (avg.)

panels.description: Long running AUTOVACUUM processes can hint at workload or configuration  problems

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  0 as time,
  max((data->'longest_autovacuum_seconds')::int8) as longest_autovacuum_seconds
FROM
  backends
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'

panels.title: Longest AUTOVACUUM duration

panels.description: Frequent sequential scans on bigger tables should usually be avoided. Warn / Error thresholds: 10 / 100

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  sum((scan-scan_lag) * 60 / extract(epoch from (time-time_lag)))
FROM (
  SELECT
    time, lag(time) over w as time_lag,
    (data->'seq_scan')::int8 as scan, lag((data->'seq_scan')::int8) over w as scan_lag
  FROM
    table_stats
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(time)
    AND dbname = '$dbname'
    AND (data->'table_size_b')::int8 > 100000000
  WINDOW w AS (partition by tag_data->>'table_full_name' order by time)
) x
WHERE scan > scan_lag and time > time_lag
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Seq. scans on >100 MB tables per minute (avg.)

panels.description: On non-temporary  tables

targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  avg(((ins-ins_lag) * 60) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag))
from (
        select 
          (data->>'tup_inserted')::int8 as ins, lag((data->>'tup_inserted')::int8) over w as ins_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where ins >= ins_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: INSERT-s per minute (avg.)

panels.description: On non-temporary  tables

targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  avg(((upd-upd_lag) * 60) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag))
from (
        select 
          (data->'tup_updated')::int8 as upd, lag((data->'tup_updated')::int8) over w as upd_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where upd >= upd_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: UPDATE-s per minute (avg.)

panels.description: On non-temporary  tables

targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  avg(((del-del_lag) * 60) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag))
from (
        select 
          (data->'tup_deleted')::int8 as del, lag((data->'tup_deleted')::int8) over w as del_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where del >= del_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: DELETE-s per minute (avg.)

panels.description: Based on db_stats.backup_duration_s  / pg_backup_start_time() [9.3+] function. N/A if no backup in progress.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  0 as time,
  max((data->'backup_duration_s')::int8)
FROM
  db_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and dbname = '$dbname'

panels.title: Backup duration

panels.description: Max. age since last VACUUM FREEZE. Could hint at problems when going into 100s of millions

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  0 as time,
  max((data->'tx_freeze_age')::int8)
FROM
  table_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and dbname = '$dbname'

panels.title: Max. table FREEZE age

panels.description: In TX. Holds back VACUUM

targets.rawSql:
select
  0 as time,
  max(xmin) from (
SELECT
  max((data->'xmin_age_tx')::int8) as xmin
FROM
  replication_slots
WHERE
  time = (select max(time) from replication_slots where time > now() - '$online_interval'::interval AND dbname = '$dbname')
  and dbname = '$dbname'  
UNION ALL
SELECT
  max((data->'max_xmin_age_tx')::int8) as xmin
FROM
  backends
WHERE
  time = (select max(time) from backends where time > now() - '$online_interval'::interval AND dbname = '$dbname')
  and dbname = '$dbname'
) x

panels.title: Max. XMIN horizon age

panels.description: Inactive repl. slots accumulate WAL files until disk space runs out. Re-animate the replica or use  pg_drop_replication_slot() to remove the slot so that Postgres can delete the un-needed WALs.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  0 as time,
  sum((data->'non_active_int')::int)
FROM
  replication_slots
WHERE
  time = (select max(time) from replication_slots where time > now() - '$online_interval'::interval AND dbname = '$dbname')
  AND dbname = '$dbname'

panels.title: Inactive repl. slots

panels.description: "Apply" (data made visible to queries on replica)  lag in bytes

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  0 as time,
  max((data->'replay_lag_b')::int8)
FROM
  replication
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'

panels.title: Max. replication lag

options.content:
### Brought to you by

[![Cybertec – The PostgreSQL Database Company](https://www.cybertec-postgresql.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/cybertec-logo-white-blue.svg)](https://www.cybertec-postgresql.com/en/)
### The preset threshold values (green / yellow / red) should be reviewed / adjusted!

list.name: dbname
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT dbname FROM admin.all_distinct_dbname_metrics ORDER BY 1;

title: Health-check
